description: An object describing an individual vessel. It should be an object in vessels, named using MMSI or a UUID
title: vessel

url.description: URL based identity of the vessel, if available.

mmsi.description: MMSI number of the vessel, if available.

mothershipMmsi.description: MMSI number of the mothership of this vessel, if available.

uuid.description: A unique Signal K flavoured maritime resource identifier, assigned by the server.

name.description: The common name of the vessel

flag.description: The country of ship registration, or flag state of the vessel

port.description: The home port of the vessel

registrations.description: The various registrations of the vessel.
registrations.example: eg for a New Zealand Part B recreational vessel: 'NZ654'

imo.description: The IMO number of the vessel.

national.description: The national registration number of the vessel.

(^[A-Za-z0-9_-]+$).description: This regex pattern is used for validating the identifier for the registration

description.example: New Zealand Part B recreational vessel

local.description: A local or state registration number of the vessel.

(^[A-Za-z0-9_-]+$).description: This regex pattern is used for validating the identifier for the registration

other.description: Other registration or permits for the vessel.

(^[A-Za-z0-9_-]+$).description: This regex pattern is used for validating the identifier for the registration

communication.description: Communication data including Radio, Telephone, E-Mail, etc.

environment.description: Environmental data measured locally including Depth, Wind, Temp, etc.

navigation.description: Navigation data including Position, Course to next WP information, etc.

propulsion.title: propulsion
propulsion.description: Engine data, each engine identified by a unique name i.e. Port_Engine

electrical.title: electrical
electrical.description: Electrical data, each electrical device indentified by a unique name i.e. Battery_1

notifications.title: notifications
notifications.description: Notifications currently raised. Major categories have well-defined names, but the tree can be extended by any hierarchical structure

collision.description: In collision with another vessel or object

piracy.description: Under attack or danger from pirates

(^((?!^mob$|^fire$|^sinking$|^flooding$|.description: This regex pattern is used for validation of the path of the alarm

steering.description: Vessel steering data for steering controls (not Autopilot 'Nav Data')

tanks.title: tanks
tanks.description: Tank data, each tank indentified by a unique name i.e. FreshWater_2

(^[A-Za-z0-9]+$).description: This regex pattern is used for validation UUID identifier for the sensor

performance.description: Performance Sailing data including VMG, Polar Speed, tack angle, etc.
